channel.title: Web Elements

item.title: Web Elements
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:6, topic:512414”]I’m sorry what the hell are you doing 

h1.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h2.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h3.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h4.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h5.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h6.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

Is equal to this:

h1.red, h2.red, h3.red, h4.red, h5.red, h6.red {
        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

Sort it out, that’s basics.[/quote]Or even better…

.red_heading {
        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

HOWEVER this isn’t semantic and it’s not recommended to name your classes for how they look

Read full topic

item.title: Web Elements
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I’m sorry what the hell are you doing 

h1.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h2.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h3.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h4.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h5.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h6.red {

        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

Is equal to this:

h1.red, h2.red, h3.red, h4.red, h5.red, h6.red {
        border: 1px solid #d58585;
        background: #ea9292;
        border-radius: 3px;
        color: #fff !important;
        text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

Sort it out, that’s basics.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Elements
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Doubt it’ll be any better than the top frameworks out there, but sure, I did the same thing for a recent project of mine.

I advise you first to get a solid grid system laid out.

Couple of tips too, always use em’s over pixels for font sizing, and the prefixes on border-radius are pointless now, just use border-radius on its own.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If it was as good as the other top frameworks out there then I’d use it but if it wasn’t then it’d just be a good learning curve for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Web Elements
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

I have been planning on making a framework of sorts for web elements. I have gotten headings done and I am continuing onto buttons. My question is, would anyone find this useful?

d22e7527391544db918a26cc60128916.png?13646991171139×567

Preview Of HTML:

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<title>Lunacy Framework - A New CSS Framework</title>
<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo.css" />
<!--- YOU MUST INCLUDE EVERYTHING AFTER THIS LINE (Up until the ending head tag) --->
<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="css/lunacy-frame.css" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="font-awesome.min.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="font-awesome.css">
<!--[if IE 7]>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="font-awesome-ie7.min.css">
<![endif]-->
</head>

<body>
<span class="center">
	<h1>All Current Tags</h1>
	<h6>Version: 0.0.1</h6>
</span>
<div class="container-fixed democ">
	<p>This is a preview list of all the tags for this version of <strong>Lunacy Framework</strong>. You can easily view the names of each tag either by editing this page <strong>index.html</strong> or viewing this pages source.</p>
	<h1>Heading 1</h1>
	<h2>Heading 2</h2>
	<h3>Heading 3</h3>
	<h4>Heading 4</h4>
	<h5>Heading 5</h5>
	<h6>Heading 6</h6>
	<br />
	<h1 class="underline">Heading 1 Underline</h1>
	<h2 class="underline">Heading 1 Underline</h2>
	<h3 class="underline">Heading 1 Underline</h3>
	<h4 class="underline">Heading 1 Underline</h4>
	<h5 class="underline">Heading 1 Underline</h5>
	<h6 class="underline">Heading 1 Underline</h6>
	<br />
	<h1 class="alert blue"><i class="icon-ok-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h1>
	<h2 class="alert blue"><i class="icon-ok-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h2>
	<h3 class="alert blue"><i class="icon-ok-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h3>
	<h4 class="alert blue"><i class="icon-ok-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h4>
	<h5 class="alert blue"><i class="icon-ok-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h5>
	<h6 class="alert blue"><i class="icon-ok-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h6>
	<br />
	<h1 class="alert red"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h1>
	<h2 class="alert red"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h2>
	<h3 class="alert red"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h3>
	<h4 class="alert red"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h4>
	<h5 class="alert red"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h5>
	<h6 class="alert red"><i class="icon-remove-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h6>
	<br />
	<h1 class="alert yellow"><i class="icon-info-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h1>
	<h2 class="alert yellow"><i class="icon-info-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h2>
	<h3 class="alert yellow"><i class="icon-info-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h3>
	<h4 class="alert yellow"><i class="icon-info-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h4>
	<h5 class="alert yellow"><i class="icon-info-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h5>
	<h6 class="alert yellow"><i class="icon-info-sign"></i> Heading 1 alert</h6>
	<br />
	<span class="center">
		<a href="#" class="button-long blue" id="fading">Fading Long Button</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-medium blue">Button Medium Blue</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short blue">Button Short Blue</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-long blue" id="fading"><i class="icon-ok"></i> Fading Icon Button</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short blue" id="fading"><i class="icon-user"></i></a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short blue"><i class="icon-ok"></i> Icon Button</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-long green" id="fading">Fading Long Button</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short green" id="fading"><i class="icon-user"></i></a>
		<a href="#" class="button-medium green">Button Medium green</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short green" id="fading"><i class="icon-ok"></i></a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short green">Button Short green</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short green" id="fading"><i class="icon-user"></i></a>
		<a href="#" class="button-long green" id="fading"><i class="icon-ok"></i> Fading Icon Button</a>
		<a href="#" class="button-short green"><i class="icon-ok"></i> Icon Button</a>
	</span>
</div>
</body>
</html>

Preview Of CSS:

/* Lunacy Framework
*      Author:     *
*    Cory Allen    *
*  Version: 0.0.1  *
*     (c) 2013     */

body {
	
	background: #f7f7f7;
	font-family: Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;
	font-size: 13px;
	color: #222;
	margin: 0;
}

/*Tag Stylings*/

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {

	color: #323232;
	font-weight: normal;
	margin: 10px;
}

h1 {

	font-size: 33px;
}

h2 {

	font-size: 30px;
}

h3 {

	font-size: 23px;
}

h4 {

	font-size: 20px;
}

h5 {

	font-size: 13px;
}

h6 {

	font-size: 10px;
}

h1.underline {

	border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1;
	padding-bottom: 3px;
}

h2.underline {

	border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1;
	padding-bottom: 3px;
}

h3.underline {

	border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1;
	padding-bottom: 3px;
}

h4.underline {

	border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1;
	padding-bottom: 3px;
}

h5.underline {

	border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1;
	padding-bottom: 3px;
}

h6.underline {

	border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1;
	padding-bottom: 3px;
}

h1.alert {

	padding: 10px;
}

h2.alert {

	padding: 10px;
}

h3.alert {

	padding: 10px;
}

h4.alert {

	padding: 10px;
}

h5.alert {

	padding: 10px;
}

h6.alert {

	padding: 10px;
}

h1.blue {

	border: 1px solid #85c1d5;
	background: #92d4ea;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #85c1d5;
}

h2.blue {

	border: 1px solid #85c1d5;
	background: #92d4ea;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #85c1d5;
}

h3.blue {

	border: 1px solid #85c1d5;
	background: #92d4ea;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #85c1d5;
}

h4.blue {

	border: 1px solid #85c1d5;
	background: #92d4ea;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #85c1d5;
}

h5.blue {

	border: 1px solid #85c1d5;
	background: #92d4ea;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #85c1d5;
}

h6.blue {

	border: 1px solid #85c1d5;
	background: #92d4ea;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #85c1d5;
}

h1.red {

	border: 1px solid #d58585;
	background: #ea9292;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h2.red {

	border: 1px solid #d58585;
	background: #ea9292;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h3.red {

	border: 1px solid #d58585;
	background: #ea9292;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h4.red {

	border: 1px solid #d58585;
	background: #ea9292;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h5.red {

	border: 1px solid #d58585;
	background: #ea9292;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h6.red {

	border: 1px solid #d58585;
	background: #ea9292;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d58585;
}

h1.yellow {

	border: 1px solid #d5d485;
	background: #eae792;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d5d485;
}

h2.yellow {

	border: 1px solid #d5d485;
	background: #eae792;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d5d485;
}

h3.yellow {

	border: 1px solid #d5d485;
	background: #eae792;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d5d485;
}

h4.yellow {

	border: 1px solid #d5d485;
	background: #eae792;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d5d485;
}

h5.yellow {

	border: 1px solid #d5d485;
	background: #eae792;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d5d485;
}

h6.yellow {

	border: 1px solid #d5d485;
	background: #eae792;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	color: #fff !important;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #d5d485;
}
/*Anchors*/

a#fading {

	transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
	-webkit-transition: all 250ms ease-in-out;
}

/*Buttons*/
a.button-long {

	display: inline-block;
	margin: 10px;
	padding: 9px 73px;
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: none;
}

a.button-medium {

	display: inline-block;
	margin: 10px;
	padding: 9px 40px;
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: none;
}

a.button-short {

	display: inline-block;
	margin: 10px;
	padding: 9px 12px;
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: none;
}

a.blue {

	background: #92d4ea;
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=0, startColorstr=#92d4ea, endColorstr=#85c1d5);
	-ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient (GradientType=0, startColorstr=#92d4ea, endColorstr=#85c1d5)"; 
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#92d4ea), to(#85c1d5));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #92d4ea, #85c1d5); 
	background-image:    -moz-linear-gradient(top, #92d4ea, #85c1d5);
	background-image:     -ms-linear-gradient(top, #92d4ea, #85c1d5);
	background-image:      -o-linear-gradient(top, #92d4ea, #85c1d5);
	border: 1px solid #73a7b8;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	-o-border-radius: 3px;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #73a7b8;
}

a.blue:hover {

	-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
	box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
}

a.green {

	background: #a0ea92;
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(GradientType=0, startColorstr=#a0ea92, endColorstr=#87d585);
	-ms-filter: "progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient (GradientType=0, startColorstr=#a0ea92, endColorstr=#87d585)"; 
	background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#a0ea92), to(#87d585));
	background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #a0ea92, #87d585); 
	background-image:    -moz-linear-gradient(top, #a0ea92, #87d585);
	background-image:     -ms-linear-gradient(top, #a0ea92, #87d585);
	background-image:      -o-linear-gradient(top, #a0ea92, #87d585);
	border: 1px solid #79b873;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	-o-border-radius: 3px;
	text-shadow: 0 1px 0 #79b873;
}

a.green:hover {

	-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
	-o-box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
	box-shadow: 0 0 20px #eee inset;
}


/*Spans*/

span.center {

	text-align: center;
}
/*Containers*/

.container-fixed {

	width: 1024px;
	height: auto;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

#container-fluid {

	height: auto;
	width: 95%;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

EDIT: Just noticed some changes I could make to the CSS to make it less code. How to hell didn’t I realize that when I was writing this. xc

Read full topic
